Document.Focus: Risks of hip and knee replacement

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Risks of hip and knee replacement ?
QAPair.Answer: All surgeries have risks for complications. Knowing what these risks are and how they apply to you is part of deciding whether or not to have surgery. You can help lower your chances of risks from surgery by planning ahead. Choose a surgeon and a hospital that provide high-quality care., Talk with your health care provider long before your surgery., Find out what you can do to help prevent problems during and after surgery. ,

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Risks of hip and knee replacement? ?
